name: ABC Animal Coloring
description:
Coloring app teaches ABC's and some animal names. A is for the ANT; Z is for ZEBRA. Each page includes both the upper and lower case examples of each letter in the alphabet.

Finger touch to select colors. Touch the page where you want to add color. Drawings can be saved to the device and then shared or printed.

Great app for small kids. They'll enjoy coloring animals while learning the alphabet.
